string.text: Damage from quick knife hits is significantly increased.
Cold weapons always attracted you; their smooth metallic shine calms you down. Of course, firearms are more comfortable, but with knife in your hands you feel more comprehensive.
Number of items available for crafting increased.

At young age you made a radio from old parts in your fathers' box, in your youth you repaired your motorcycle using spare parts from flea markets, but now you feel that you will certainly find use of technical garbage in The Zone.
More rapid and effective use of the knife when cutting prey.

You cause fear to the mutants of the Zone, and not surprisingly. In most cases, you are the last thing they see before they die. Learning what you do to the body of the mutants after, people become even more afraid of you.
Less harm to health when eating harmful food.
Delicious and high-quality food in The Zone is a rarity, but you are able to consume and digest even what a stalker wouldn't.
Reduced radiation of artifacts in your backpack.
Gifts of The Zone are attractive, but extremely dangerous. Not so long ago you got a special backpack, which should neutralize some of their radiation. It's time to try it out in business.
Increased chance to find more things in caches.

You are accustomed to notice the most insignificant details not only in the behavior of people, but also in the surrounding environment, and even searching in a stash. Not one cent, nor a single bolt can hide from you.
Chance to find artifacts is increased.
Humming, hissing and spitting - Anomalies are no longer able to scare you, and the urge for research has led to a detailed study of anomalous fields.
Number of companions increased, interrogations are more effective, reputation is gained faster, more opportunities in dialogues.

Whether it's a charm, an ability to talk or perhaps a subtle knowledge of human psychology - it does not matter what, but you easily win the hearts of many people, whether a greedy huckster or an outspoken psychopath.
Recoil of small arms is significantly reduced.

In whatever condition you are, whether it be an emotional shock, a wild hangover or a small earthquake while traveling on public transport - your hand will never falter. You keep your weapons so tight that you leave dents on the grip and buttstock.
